name: ListMetadataFormats Generator
description: Retrieves the metadata formats available from a repository. An optional argument restricts the request to the formats available for a specific item.

parameters.name: nodes
parameters.description: Optionally specify on which nodes to run and how many instances you want on each node.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of node handler, one of SingleNode, SomeNodes, AllNodes (leave empty for local execution)

parameters.name: nodes
parameters.description: The nodes to use for this node handler type

parameters.name: instances
parameters.description: The amount of instances per node of this handler type

parameters.name: stop_on_error
parameters.description: If set to false, Tuktu will not kill the flow on data error.

parameters.name: target
parameters.description: The URL of the OAI-PMH target repository.

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: An optional argument that specifies the unique identifier of the item for which available metadata formats are being requested. If this argument is omitted, then the response includes all metadata formats supported by the target repository.

parameters.name: toJSON
parameters.description: Converts XML set descriptions to JSON?
